tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Entertainment (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), genre VARCHAR(50), release_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE movies (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), genre VARCHAR(100), release_year INT);
CREATE TABLE actors (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10));
CREATE TABLE Movies (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title STRING, genre STRING, release_year INT)
CREATE TABLE TVShows (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title STRING, genre STRING, release_year INT)
CREATE TABLE Actors (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, age INT, gender STRING)
CREATE TABLE movies (movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR, genre VARCHAR, release_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE actors (actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR, last_name VARCHAR, dob DATE, gender VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE directors (director_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR, last_name VARCHAR, dob DATE);
CREATE TABLE movie_cast (movie_id INT, actor_id INT, character_name VARCHAR, PRIMARY KEY (movie_id, actor_id));
CREATE TABLE movies (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, release_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE actors (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE directors (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, nationality VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE studios (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, headquarters VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE awards (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, year INT NOT NULL);
